Description: Pottery sherd from a jar painted in blue, cream, white and black paint.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Curator's comments: No longer seen as Minoan influenced. Nile silt fabric. Fitton, J.L., Hughes, M. and Quirke, S. (1998), ‘Northerners at Lahun: Neutron Activation Analysis of Minoan and related pottery in the British Museum’, in S. Quirke (ed.) Lahun Studies, p. 124
Bibliographic references: Kemp & Merrillees 1980 / Minoan Pottery in Second Millennium Egypt (Ka.27) (p. 75)
